description: User cannot login with invalid credentials
steps: Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

description: Free user Fred can login with valid email/password credentials
steps: Verify user name 'Fred' is displayed in header

description: Premium user Peter can login with valid credentials
Google OAuth sign-in button is present and functional
steps: Verify 'Sign in with Google' button is visible
Verify OAuth redirect to Google authentication page

description: GitHub OAuth sign-in button is present and functional
steps: Verify 'Sign in with GitHub' button is visible
Verify OAuth redirect to GitHub authentication page

description: User can sign up with email and password
steps: Enter a valid password meeting requirements
Verify account creation success message or redirect to dashboard

description: User can logout successfully
steps: Click on user profile menu or account icon
Verify redirect to homepage or login page
Verify user is no longer authenticated

description: Admin user Alice can login and access admin features
steps: Verify admin-specific features or menu items are visible

description: Homepage displays curated gallery of public prompts
steps: Navigate to homepage without logging in
Verify prompt cards are displayed in a gallery layout
Verify each card shows title, description, and star rating
Verify copy button is visible on each prompt card

description: Prompts can be sorted by top-rated
steps: Click or select 'Top Rated' sort option
Verify prompts are reordered by rating (highest first)
Verify the first prompt has the highest visible rating

description: Prompts can be sorted by trending
steps: Verify prompts are reordered by trending metric

description: Prompts can be sorted by newest
steps: Verify prompts are reordered by creation date (newest first)

description: Prompts can be filtered by category
steps: Click on a category filter option
Verify only prompts in that category are displayed
Verify category filter indicator is shown as active

description: Visitor can copy a prompt to clipboard
steps: Navigate to homepage without logging in
Click the 'Copy' button on the prompt card
Verify confirmation message or toast appears
Verify prompt text is copied to clipboard

description: Visitor can view prompt detail page
steps: Click on a prompt card to view details
Verify prompt detail page opens (modal or new page)
Verify full prompt text is displayed

description: Search functionality works for prompts
steps: Enter a search term in the search box
Press Enter or click search button
Verify results match the search term in title or description

description: Logged-in user can rate a public prompt with stars
steps: Navigate to a public prompt detail page
Click on star rating selector (1-5 stars)
Verify updated average rating is displayed

description: Logged-in user can write a text review for a prompt
steps: Navigate to a public prompt detail page
Verify review appears in the reviews list

description: Ratings display Amazon-style star visualization
steps: Navigate to a public prompt with reviews
Verify star rating shows filled and empty stars
Verify rating count is displayed (e.g., '4.5 stars from 23 reviews')

description: Anonymous visitors cannot submit reviews
steps: Navigate to a public prompt detail page without logging in
Attempt to click rating or review button
Verify login prompt or redirect to login page

description: Dashboard shows left sidebar navigation
steps: Verify sidebar contains: Library, Wizard, Reviews, GitHub, Settings links

description: Dashboard shows pinned prompts section
steps: Verify pinned prompts are displayed as cards if any exist

steps: Verify recently created or edited prompts are displayed

description: Dashboard shows quick action for Create New Prompt

Verify wizard or creation form opens

description: Dashboard shows quick action for Improve Prompt tools
steps: Verify 'Improve Prompt' button or card is visible

description: Dashboard displays GitHub sync status for premium users
steps: Verify GitHub sync status indicator is visible
Verify status shows 'Connected', 'Not connected', or sync state

description: User can view their personal prompt library
steps: Verify library page displays list of user's prompts
Verify each prompt shows title, description, and actions

description: User can create a new prompt manually
User can edit an existing prompt
User can delete a prompt from library
steps: Verify prompt is removed from library

steps: Find a prompt that is not pinned
Verify prompt appears in Pinned Prompts section

description: User can unpin a prompt from dashboard
steps: Verify prompt is removed from Pinned Prompts section

steps: Add tags in the tags field
Verify tags are displayed on the prompt

description: User can filter library by tags
steps: Click on a tag filter or enter tag in filter
Verify only prompts with that tag are displayed

description: User can search within their library
steps: Enter search term in library search box
Verify filtered results match search term

description: User can save a public prompt to their library
steps: Navigate to homepage or public discovery

description: User can access the Prompt Creation Wizard

description: Wizard Step 1: User can enter goal/intent

description: Wizard Step 2: User can specify domain/context

Wizard Step 5: User can provide examples
Wizard Step 6: User can select target LLM
Wizard generates a personalized prompt

description: Wizard session is saved to database

description: Free user wizard usage increments counter

Verify refined prompt with improved clarity is returned

steps: Verify refined prompt with expanded detail is returned

description: Refinement tool: Shorten

description: Refinement tool: Debug prompt

Ask 'How can I improve this prompt?'

description: Conversation history is maintained in session
steps: Verify AI responds contextually to conversation

description: LLM coach usage count increments

steps: Open version history for a prompt

Calculate expected average from reviews table
